Quest.QuestDescription: Luke has had is sword stolen speak to him to find out how you may help

Conversation.Dialogue: Luke: Hello {CHARACTER_NAME}, I'm looking for a piece of armour. Any chance you could help me out?
{CHARACTER_NAME}: Sure thing, what is it you are looking for?
Luke: The bandits have stolen my sword. I'm they'll hand it over once you start causing them some trouble
{CHARACTER_NAME}: Thanks, I'll go see what I can do
Luke: Oh thank god, you took your time.
Luke: nevertheless you did what was needed.
